item.title: About Me
item.description: Hola :) My name is Miguel and I’ve recently turned 20. I’m a student at CPI Los Enlaces, Zaragoza, and soon-to-be Higher Technician in Web Development. Being deeply interested in technology and helping others has always been a part of me. Hence, I chose my current studies as a way of personal achievement and improving my knowledge in that field. I believe that I am very versatile, optimistic, and creative when it comes to solving problems, and I consider myself a very communicative and easygoing person.
